page.title: 13ST.JOHN'S C.E.PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: St. John's School is the only school in our area and stands close by the Church of St.John the Baptist in Theobalds Park Road.Its Charter dates from 1867 and the original school building dates from 1888.Alterations and extensions were made in 1969, the original building forming the central hall, with the addition of infant and junior classrooms, an entrance hall, staffroom, cloakrooms and kitchen facilities.Originally, children from 5 to 14 attended, but the senior school closed in 1945.Today there is an infant class of 26 children aged from 4 to 7 and a junior class of 31 children aged from 7 to 11.There are 3 full-time teachers including the Head- teacher.There are 2 part-time music teachers.The school has a full-time welfare assistant and 3 dinner-time staff.
